0.text: Innate: Quinn's damaging abilities mark enemies with Vulnerable,  revealing them for 4 seconds. If no Vulnerable target exists for 1 second,  Valor automatically marks a nearby visible enemy, which cannot recur for 8 − 2.93 (based on critical strike chance) seconds after the mark has timed out, was consumed or was overwritten by another mark.
0.html: Innate: Quinn's damaging abilities mark enemies with Vulnerable, revealing them for 4 seconds. If no Vulnerable target exists for 1 second, Valor automatically marks a nearby visible enemy, which cannot recur for 8 − 2.93 (based on critical strike chance) seconds after the mark has timed out, was consumed or was overwritten by another mark.

1.text: Quinn's basic attacks against Vulnerable targets are empowered to consume the mark to deal 10 − 95 (based on level) (+ 16% − 50% (based on level) AD) bonus physical damage.
1.html: Quinn's basic attacks against Vulnerable targets are empowered to consume the mark to deal 10 − 95 (based on level) (+ 16% − 50% (based on level) AD) bonus physical damage.

1.text: 16% − 50% (based on level)

2.text: While  Behind Enemy Lines is active, Harrier is disabled and all Vulnerable marks are removed.
2.html: While Behind Enemy Lines is active, Harrier is disabled and all Vulnerable marks are removed.

1.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 210

0.text: Active: Quinn sends Valor in the target direction who stops upon hitting an enemy, marking it as  Vulnerable and dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Quinn sends Valor in the target direction who stops upon hitting an enemy, marking it as Vulnerable and dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies.

1.text: If the primary target was a  champion, they become  nearsighted for 1.75 seconds, otherwise they are  disarmed instead.
1.html: If the primary target was a champion, they become nearsighted for 1.75 seconds, otherwise they are disarmed instead.

1.text: CAST TIME: NONE

0.text: Passive: Attacking a  Vulnerable target or consuming a mark grants Quinn  bonus attack speed and  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
0.html: Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target or consuming a mark grants Quinn  bonus attack speed and  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

1.text: Active:  Valor grants  sight of the surrounding area for 2 seconds and  reveals enemy champions within for the same duration.
1.html: Active: Valor grants sight of the surrounding area for 2 seconds and reveals enemy champions within for the same duration.

0.text: Active: Quinn  dashes to the target enemy, dealing physical damage,  knocking them back, though not through terrain, and  slowing them by 50% decaying over 1.5 seconds. She then  leaps back 525 units away from them.
0.html: Active: Quinn dashes to the target enemy, dealing physical damage, knocking them back, though not through terrain, and slowing them by 50% decaying over 1.5 seconds. She then leaps back 525 units away from them.

1.text: Heightened Senses can be cast during either of the dashes.
1.html: Heightened Senses can be cast during either of the dashes.

1.text: COST: 100 / 50 / 0 MANA

0.text: Active: Quinn  channels for 2 seconds, signaling  Valor to pair up. Upon completion, he picks her up and they unite, increasing her  total movement speed, granting her  ghosting, and allowing her to cast  Skystrike. Behind Enemy Lines can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the channel.
0.html: Active: Quinn channels for 2 seconds, signaling Valor to pair up. Upon completion, he picks her up and they unite, increasing her  total movement speed, granting her ghosting, and allowing her to cast Skystrike. Behind Enemy Lines can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the channel.

1.text: Taking damage from non- minions while Behind Enemy Lines is active or while Quinn is  channeling causes her to lose the bonus total movement speed for 3 seconds. Becoming  immobilized,  grounded, or  silenced ends Behind Enemy Lines immediately and puts it on  cooldown without performing  Skystrike.
1.html: Taking damage from non- minions while Behind Enemy Lines is active or while Quinn is channeling causes her to lose the bonus total movement speed for 3 seconds. Becoming immobilized, grounded, or silenced ends Behind Enemy Lines immediately and puts it on  cooldown without performing Skystrike.

2.text: Once Behind Enemy Lines has been learned, respawning or returning to the summoning platform will spawn  Valor instantly.
2.html: Once Behind Enemy Lines has been learned, respawning or returning to the summoning platform will spawn Valor instantly.

3.text: Recast: Quinn cancels the channel, placing Behind Enemy Lines on cooldown.
3.html: Recast: Quinn cancels the channel, placing Behind Enemy Lines on cooldown.

0.text: Active: Quinn detaches from Valor, ending  Behind Enemy Lines' effects and raining arrows down around her, dealing 70% AD physical damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Quinn detaches from Valor, ending Behind Enemy Lines' effects and raining arrows down around her, dealing 70% AD physical damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: Declaring a basic attack or casting  Blinding Assault or  Vault during  Behind Enemy Lines automatically activates Skystrike.
1.html: Declaring a basic attack or casting Blinding Assault or Vault during Behind Enemy Lines automatically activates Skystrike.

If no Vulnerable target exists for 1 second,  Valor automatically marks a nearby visible enemy, which cannot recur for 8 − 2.93 (based on critical strike chance) seconds after the mark has timed out, was consumed or was overwritten by another mark.

1.text: Quinn's basic attacks against Vulnerable targets are empowered to consume the mark to deal 10 − 95 (based on level) (+ 16% − 50% (based on level) AD) bonus physical damage.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Passive

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bring It Down: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BRING IT DOWN: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  625

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal ( 12% / 8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes all stacks to deal 40 − 150 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (20 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal ( 12% /  8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Quinn  channels for 2 seconds, signaling  Valor to pair up. Upon completion, he picks her up and they unite, increasing her  total movement speed, granting her  ghosting, and allowing her to cast  Skystrike. Behind Enemy Lines can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the channel.
